does anyone know how i can find number 16? Regulating page access? i couldnt find these tutorials anywhere else and this so far is the best one i have used

Yeah same problem.

The folder "16.Regulating Page Access" is empty!
The "Regulating Page Access" videos are inside the "Building the Public Area" folder :)

To get Free Lynda.com lessons goto:

www.lynda.com/deke

This should give you a 7 day free trial. you can view/capture lesson #16

After having Downloaded and unrar'd file. I have located the "Missing" chapter.

Folder 15 has chapter 14 and chapter 15 "Regulating Page Access" files in there.

There are no chapters missing that I can tell.
